creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: bulb shaped with ring handles; handles held on by hardware with animal-like "face"; incised pattern covers entire vessel; vessle is green with areas of white showing through the pattern
text: Made during a highly creative period of bronze casting, this precisely fashioned <I>hu<I> originally had its recessed geometric design inlaid with copper and turquoise.
title: Wine vessel hu
